tool_description: Find the technologies that powers a company
name: runs.tech
title: runs.tech

api_list.name: getTechDomains
api_list.description: Retrieve the domains that use a specific technology
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://runs-tech.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tech/g-suite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "runs-tech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://runs-tech.p.rapidapi.com/v1/tech/{tech}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "runs-tech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
